articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: EMA lists rare spinal condition as side effect of AstraZeneca's Covid-19 vaccine - New Straits Times
articles.description: A safety panel of the European drug regulator on Friday recommended adding a rare spinal inflammation called transverse myelitis as a side effect of AstraZeneca’s Covid-19 vaccine.

articles.title: Omicron could make booster doses counterproductive, EMA suggests - MercoPress
articles.description: The European Medicines Agency (EMA) has ventured this week that repeated booster doses of vaccine risked overloading people's immune systems and was not a sustainable strategy.
articles.content:
